title: Treat UseUtf8Encoding=true as "always"
body:
In `ToolTask` and derived tasks like `Exec`:

> `UseUtf8Encoding="true"` is ignored; [valid values are are `Always`, `Never`, or `Detect`](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/visualstudio/msbuild/exec-task?view=vs-2022#:~:text=Valid%20values%20are%20Always%2C%20Never%2C%20or%20Detect.). We should probably treat `true` as `Always` though, since it isn't currently an error.

 _Originally posted by @rainersigwald in [#4870](https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/issues/4870#issuecomment-2444584058)_
